title: Mr Boukadoum takes part in OIC ministerial meeting on Palestine
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, on Sunday, took part in the extraordinary ministerial meeting of the Executive Committee of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OCI) at the level of foreign ministers on the situation in occupied Palestine.
This meeting, which was held by video conference, was devoted to the situation in the occupied Palestinian territories, following Israel’s attacks on the city of Al-Quds Al-Sharif and the Gaza Strip.

The work of the Executive Committee culminated in the adoption of a declaration in which the OIC condemns the Israel’s abject violence against the Palestinian people, and reiterates, its support for the legitimate rights of the Palestinian people, including the establishment of Palestinian State with Al-Quds Al-Sharif as a capital city.
